name: Formwear
tagline: Let fashion savvy users from around the world pick out your next wardrobe.
body:
![](http://oi59.tinypic.com/k92dx.jpg)
![](http://oi61.tinypic.com/30uzqrc.jpg)

Fashion application where users can recommend outfits to their friends  
Save, refer, and purchase articles of clothing you really like  
See what sort of styles your friends are wearing
